creator: james.fuller.2007@gmail.com
text:
or at the least have the <available/> Task documentation highlight that these
are redundant attributes, as it is in conditions Task definition.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
This is what http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/conditions.html says:

> This condition is identical to the Available task, all attributes and nested
> elements of that task are supported, the property and value attributes are
> redundant and will be ignored.
